title: Establishing an updated consensus on the conceptual and operational definitions of Making Every Contact Count (MECC) across experts within research and practice: an international Delphi Study
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 230

Author(s): B. Nichol, E. Kemp, R. Wilson, A.M. Rodrigues, H. Hesselgreaves, C. Robson, C. Haighton
